، is main ayk wahad tarykha ap dayt hay js ka mksad knkryt aabzarwr kay nfaza kay zaryaha awwrrada hona haay۔ knkryt awysrwr klas aabzarwr klas ka thws nfaza haay۔jb ap dayt mwsawl hawta hay tou yeh mkhsawsa slwk ki wzuahat karnay kay liye ap dayt kay tarykha kar ko awwr raida krta haay۔as msaal main ، yeh mwsawlha dayta ko aasany sy prnt krta haay۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal main ، hum ayk mzumwn msaal aur do knkryt awysrwr msaal tyar karty hayn۔mbsaryn rjstr_bsrwr tarykha astamal krkay is mzumwn kay sath rjstrda hayn۔as kay bad ، hum kuch dayta pas karty hoey ، is mwzuwa par nwtyfaiy_bswrza ko kal karty hayn۔as sy hr rjstrda mbsar ki tazaha kary kay tarykha kar ko mthark kya jata hay ، aur woh mwsawlha dayta prnt karty hayn۔jb nwtyfaiy_bswrza ko dwbarha blaya jata hay tou ، ghair rjstrda mbsaryn ko mtala nahin kya jata haay۔ yeh msaal zaahar krty hay keh kis tarah mbsaryn ka nmwnha is mwzuwa aur mbsaryn kay mabyn dahylay jwraay ko kabl bnata hay ، js sy mtadd mbsaryn ko mkhsawsa mbsaryn kay baray main aaghaha hony kay baghair mwzuwa main tbdylywn par rd aml zaahar karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔

Question: azaghr main kchray kay jma karnay kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur mymwry kay antzaam kay liye astamal hony wali mkhtlf hakmt amlywn ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: azaghr main ، dono tjrydy klas aur antrfys maahadwn ki wzuahat karnay aur klaswn main kuch tarza aml ko nafza karnay kay tarykha kar kay tawr par kam karty hayn۔taham ، un kay astamal aur salahaytwn main kuch akhtlafat hayn۔aaiyay ayk tjrydy klas kay astamal kay fwaid aur khrabywn aur azaghr main antrfys par tbadlha khyal karty hayn: khlasaha klaswn kay fwaid: kwda dwbarha astamal: khlasaha klas tarykwn kay liye pehlay sy taay shuda nfaza fraham krskty hay ، js sy akhza krdha klaswn ko is kwda ka warsa aur dwbarha astamal karnay ki ajazat mil sakti haay۔as sy kwda kay dwbarha astamal ko frwgh mlta hay aur faltw pn ko kam kya jata haay۔ jzawy aml draamd: khlasaha klasza khlasaha tarykwn ki wzuahat krsktay hain jn ko akhza krdha klaswn kay zaryaha nafza karna zurwry haay۔as sy tjrydy tabkay ko jzawy aml draamd fraham karnay ki ajazat mlty hay jabky mkhsawsa tfsaylat akhza krdha klaswn ko chhwra dytay hayn۔ tay.khlasaha klas khwd۔yha ayk khraby hawskty hay agar kesi klas ko apni zurwryat ko pora karnay kay liye mtadd tjrydy klaswn sy warsa hony ki zurwrt haw۔zayly tabkat khlasaha tabkay kay nfaza kay liye mzubwtay sy pabnd hain ، js sy zurwrt pranay par mkhtlf bys klas main tbdyl hona zayada mshkl hawta haay۔ antrfys kay kabl aml: ayk sy zayada wrasat: mtadd klaswn kay zaryaha antrfys ko nafza kya jaskta hay ، js sy klas drjha bndy main zayada sy zayada lchk pyda hawty haay۔ayk klas mtadd antrfys ko nafza krskty hay ، js sy isy mkhtlf maahadwn ko pora karnay aur mtadd tarza aml par aml karnay kay kabl bnata haay۔ lwza jwraay: antrfys klaswn kay mabyn dahylay jwraay ko frwgh dytay hayn۔sarf antrfys ki taryf par anhasaar karty hoey ، klasza ayk dusray kay sath mkhsawsa aml draamd ki tfsaylat jannay ki zurwrt kay baghair bat chyt krskty hayn۔ maahadha anfwrsmnt: antrfys ayk wazuha maahaday ki wzuahat karty hain js ki klaswn par aml karna chahaiay۔as sy yeh ykyny bnanay main mdd mlty hay keh zurwry tarykwn aur tarza aml ko mkhtlf klaswn main mstkl tawr par nafza kya jata haay۔ antrfys kay dara byks: pehlay sy taay shuda aml draamd ki kmy: khlasaha klaswn kay braks ، azaghr main antrfys tarykwn kay liye pehlay sy taay shuda aml draamd nahin karty hayn۔klaswn ko nafza karnay main antrfys kay zaryaha byan krdha tamam tarykwn ki wzuahat karni hogi ، yahan tak keh agar un main bhi isi tarah ki faalyt haay۔ koi kwda dwbarha prywstyt nhayn: chwnkha antrfys sirf kesi pehlay sy taay shuda nfaza kay baghair tarykha kar kay dstkhtawn ki wzuahat karty hain ، lhazaa is kwda ko nafza karnay waly klaswn kay mabyn dwbarha astamal nahin kya jaskta۔as sy kwda ki nkl pyda hawskty hay agar isi tarah kay tarza aml ko mtadd klaswn main nafza karnay ki zurwrt haw۔ khlasaha main ، azaghr main khlasaha klas zayada lchk ، kwda dwbarha prywst aur jzawy aml draamd ki salahaytwn ko fraham karty hayn۔dwsry taraf ، antrfys dahylay jwraay ، mtadd wrasat aur maahaday kay nfaza ko frwgh dytay hayn۔khlasaha klas ya antrfys kay astamal kay darmiyan antkhab is mnsawbay ki mkhsawsa zurwryat aur dayzaain kay thafzaat par mnhasar haay۔

Question: ayk lahakha drkht ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain aur mwsar tzaiyn ki tlash kay liye tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!yhaan ayk azaghr klas ka ayk msaal hay jo ayk kam sy kam ki ktaar ki nmaindghy krta hay js main ayk kam sy kam ki ktaar ki nmaindghy hawty haay: paiytwn kwpy kwdaklas trjyhay kyw: dayf __init __ (khwd): sylf۔ hayp = [] Def is_empty (khwd)dayf dakhl karain (khwd ، aaitm): sylf۔ hayp.aypynda (aaitm) sylf۔. ") agar lyn (self.heap) == 1: waps lwtaiyn۔aaly tryn_prywyty dayf jhanknay (khwd) ko waps kryn: agar sylf۔ aai ays_pty (): andayks ayrr ("trjyhay ktaar khaly haay۔") khud waps kryn۔2 jabky asharyha> 0 aur sylf۔ hayp [andayks] <sylf۔ hayp [waldyn]: khwdwaldyn = (andayks - 1) // 2 dayf _ daawn_haypaif (sylf ، andayks): bchha = 2 * andayks + 1 jabky bchha <lyn (sylf۔ hayp): agar bchha + 1 <lyn (sylf۔ hayp) aur sylf۔ hayp۔hayp [chailda] ، sylf۔ hayp [andayks] andayks = chailda chailda = 2 * andayks + 1 is par aml draamd main ، trjyhay tabkay ki klas kam sy kam ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye ayk fharst (sylf۔ aych ay aay py) astamal krty haay۔dahyr main mwjwd anasar ko un ki trjyha ki bnyad par hakm diya jata haay۔ aai ays_pty tarykha chyk krta hay keh aya dahyr ki lmbaiy ki janch krkay trjyhay ktaar khaly hay ya nhayn۔ dakhl karnay ka tarykha dahyr main kesi shay ko shaml krta haay۔yha aaitm ko dahyr kay aakhr main shaml krta hay aur phir is chyza ko apnay waldyn kay sath tbdyl krkay kam sy kam praprty ko bhaal karnay kay liye "ap haypaif" aapryshn anjam dyta haay۔ hazaf karnay ka tarykha trjyha sy aaly trjyhay aaitm ko hatata hay aur waps krta haay۔ktaar.yha dahyr ki jra ko aakhry aaitm kay sath bdl dyta hay aur phir is kay sab sy chhwtay bchay kay sath is chyza ko tbdyl krkay kam sy kam praprty ko bhaal karnay kay liye "daawn haypaif" aapryshn anjam dyta haay۔ jhanknay ka tarykha trjyha sy aaly trjyhay aaitm ko lwtata haay۔asay hataiay baghair ktaar۔yha aasany sy dahyr ki jra ko lwtata haay۔ _up_heapify tarykha ayk mddghar tarykha hay jo ap haypyfaiy aapryshn anjam dyta haay۔yha dyiay gaye andayks main aaitm ko apnay waldyn sy mwazanha krta hay aur kam sy kam praprty ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye agar zurwry ho tou un ko tbdyl krta haay۔yha is aml ko is wkt tak jary rakhy ga jab tak keh shay apni sahayha pwzayshn main nah ho ya dahyr ki jra tak phanch jaiay۔ _ daawn_haypaiyfai tarykha ayk aur mddghar tarykha hay jo daawn haypaif aapryshn anjam dyta haay۔yha dyiay gaye andayks main is shay ka mwazanha apnay bchwn kay sath krta hay aur kam sy kam praprty ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye zurwry ho tou isy chhwtay chhwtay bchay kay sath tbdyl krta haay۔as aml ko is wkt tak jary rakha jata hay jab tak keh shay apni sahayha pwzayshn main nah ho ya kesi pty kay nwda tak nah phanchay۔ nwt karain keh is aml sy yeh frzu kya gaya hay keh trjyhay ktaar main dakhl hony waly anasar ka mwazanha kya jaskta hay (yany ، woh <aaprytr ko nafza karty hayn)۔

Question: "azaghr main rd aml prwghramngh aur rd aml ki twsya (RX) kay asawlwn par tbadlha khyal karain ، aur yeh btaiyn keh woh wakaha sy chlnay waly nzaam ko kis tarah aasan bnatay hayn۔"
Answer: daykwrytr pytrn azaghr main ayk sakhty dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo aap ko kesi shay main ayk ya zayada daykwrytr ashyaa main lpyt kar mthark tawr par azuafy tarza aml ya zamha darywn ko shaml karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha nmwnha "wrasat sy zayada mrkb" kay asawl ki pyrwy krta hay aur kwda main lchk aur twsya ko frwgh dyta haay۔ daykwrytr pytrn main ، ayk bys aabjykt mwjwd hay jsay azuafy faalyt kay sath brahanay ki zurwrt haay۔bys aabjykt main braha rast trmym karnay kay bjaiay ، sjawt ko bys aabjykt ko lpytnay aur mtalwbha azuafha fraham karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔har daykwrytr ayk mkhsawsa tarza aml ka azuafha krta hay jabky ab bhi bys aabjykt kay antrfys ko brkrar rkhtay hayn۔daykwrytrza ko sjawt ya ayk sath mlaya jaskta hay ، js sy faalyt ki mtadd prtwn ko shaml kya jaskta haay۔ yahan ayk aysy msaal hay jo azaghr main daykwrytr pytrn kay astamal ko zaahar krty haay: paiythwn kwpy kwdaklas ajzaa(khwd): wapsy "knkrytkmpynt: aapryshn" klas daykwrytr (ajzaaa): dayf __init __ (khwd ، jzaw): sylf daat kamywnt = jzaw dayf aapryshn (khwd)aapryshn () return f "concretedecoratora: {self.compointer.operation ()}" klas knkrytdaykwrtrb (daykwrytr): dayf aapryshn (khwd): wapsy f "concretedecoratorb: {self.compointer.operation ()}"# astamal ki msaal: ajzaaa = kankrytkwmypynt () daykwrytr 1 = knkrytdaykwrta (jzaw) daykwrytr 2 = knkrytdaykwrtr by (daykwrytr 1) prnt (daykwrytr 2۔aapryshn ()) is msaal main ، hamary pas ayk jzaw antrfys hay jo tamam ajzaaa kay liye mshtrkha antrfys ki wzuahat krta haay۔knkrytkmpynt klas jzaw antrfys ko nafza krta hay aur bys aabjykt ki nmaindghy krta hay jsay hum brahana chahti hayn۔ daykwrytr klas tamam sjawt kay liye bys klas haay۔yha jzaw antrfys ko bhi nafza krta hay aur lpytay hoey jzaw ka hawalha brkrar rkhta haay۔daykwrytr klas ka aapryshn tarykha aasany sy kal ko lpytay hoey ajzaaa par bhyjta haay۔ knkrytdaykwrtra aur knkrytdaykwrtr by klasza knkryt sjawt hayn۔wha daykwrytr klas sy warsa hawtay hain aur lpytay hoey jzaw main mkhsawsa faalyt shaml karty hayn۔har daykwrytr aapryshn kay tarykha kar ko awwr raida krta hay ، pehlay lpytay hoey jzaw kay aapryshn kay tarykha kar ko kal krta hay aur phir is kay apnay tarza aml ko shaml krta haay۔ astamal ki msaal main ، hum knkrytkmpmnt klas ki ayk msaal bnatay hayn۔as kay bad ، hum isy knkrytdaykwrtra aur knkrytdaykwrtr by aarkairza sy lpyttay hayn۔jb hum daykwrytr 2 aabjykt par aapryshn kay tarykha kar ko kal karty hain tou ، yeh andrwny daykwrytr sy shrwa karty hoey aur bahar ki taraf phyltay hoey ، sjawt kay zaryaha kal chyn ko mthark krta haay۔har daykwrytr aghlay sjawt ya bys jzaw main janay sy pehlay aapryshn main apnay mkhsawsa slwk ko shaml krta haay۔aakhr main ، hamain mtalwbha ntyjha tamam azuafy afadyt kay sath mlta haay۔ daykwrytr pytrn hamain msthakm wrasat par bhrwsha karnay kay bjaiay sjawt kay sath ashyaa ko lpyt kar rn taim kay wkt mthark tawr par tarza aml ko shaml karnay ya is main trmym karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔as sy kwda ki lchk ، dwbarha prywstyt ، aur zurwrt kay mtaabk fnkshnlty ko akhtlata aur mych karnay ki salahayt ko frwgh mlta haay۔

Question: dayta bys main hum aahanghy kay kntrwl kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur alag thlgh staha aur un kay tjarty talkat par tbadlha khyal kryn۔
Answer: azaghr main ، fnkshn awwrlwdangh sy mrad ayk hi nam kay sath mtadd afaal ki wzuahat karnay ki salahayt hay lekin mkhtlf pyramytrza ya dlyl ki aksam۔yha kesi fnkshn ko is ki tadad ، aardar ، ya dlail ki aksam ki bnyad par mkhtlf aapryshn anjam denay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ jawa ya sy ++ jesay dyghr prwghramngh zabanwn main ، fnkshn awwrlwdangh ayk zaban ki khsawsayt hay jo ayk hi nam kay sath mtadd afaal ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyty hay lekin mkhtlf pyramytr ki wzuahat krty haay۔fharstyn۔mrtb ya rn taim sstm taay krta hay keh kal sait par fraham krdha dlail ki bnyad par kon sa fnkshn kal karna haay۔as khsawsayt ko aksar "jamd" ya "mrtb wkt" fnkshn awwrlwdangh kaha jata haay۔ taham ، azaghr main ، fnkshn awwrlwdangh zaban ki mthark taipngh aur bth taipngh nwayt ki wjha sy mkhtlf tarykay sy kam krta haay۔azaghr hakyky jamd fnkshn awwrlwdangh jesay jawa ya sy ++ ki hamayt nahin krta haay۔as kay bjaiay ، azaghr kesi khasa nam kay sath sirf ayk bar ayk fnkshn ki taryf karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، aur isi nam kay sath fnkshn ki taryfyn sirf pchhly taryf ko tbdyl kryn۔tazaha trien taryf fnkshn ka mwsar nfaza bn jati haay۔ azaghr main awwrlwdangh jesay tarza aml ko haasal karnay kay liye ، dawylprza aam tawr par pehlay sy taay shuda dlyl ki akdar ، mtghyr lmbaiy ki dlyl ki fharstwn (*aarghs ، ** kwwrghs) ، aur is kay andr mshrwta mntak ka mjmwaha astamal karty hayn۔fraham krdha dlail ki bnyad par mkhtlf maamlat ko snbhalnay kay liye fnkshn۔ yahan azaghr main fnkshn awwrlwdangh ki wzuahat karnay ki ayk msaal: paiythwn kwpy kwdaydaf kylkwlyt_aryha (lmbaiy ، chwraaiy = koi nhayn): agar chwraaiy koi nahin haay: # mrba wapsy ki lmbaiy ka hasab ktab: #msttayl wapsy ki lmbaiy kay alakay ka hasab lghaiyn * chwraaiy is msaal kay tawr par ، hamary pas ayk fnkshn ka hasab ktab hay jo shkl kay rkbay ka hasab lghata haay۔as ki wzuahat ayk hi pyramytr ki lmbaiy aur akhtyary pyramytr ki chwraaiy kay sath ki hogi haay۔aghr chwraaiy fraham nahin ki hogi hay (yany yeh koi bhi nahin haay) ، tou fnkshn yeh frzu krta hay keh shkl ayk mrba hay aur isi kay mtaabk is kay alakay ka hasab lghaty haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، agar chwraaiy fraham ki jati hay tou ، fnkshn yeh frzu krta hay keh shkl ayk msttayl hay aur lmbaiy aur chwraaiy ki bnyad par is kay alakay ka hasab lghaty haay۔ hum mtalwbha slwk ko haasal karnay kay liye mkhtlf dlyl kay amtzaaj kay sath hasab ktab_yrya fnkshn ko kal krsktay hayn: paiytwn kwpy kwda prnt (hasab ktab_aryha (5)) # aaؤt pt: 25 (ayk mrba ka rkbha) prnt (hasab ktab_aryha (5 ، 3)) # aaؤt pt: 15 (msttayl ka rkbha) is tarah sy ، fnkshn ka hasab ktab_yrya mkhtlf maamlat ko hayndal krta hay jo mnzawr shuda dlail ki tadad ki bnyad par hawta hay aur fraham krta haaymnasb slwk۔ khlasaha karnay kay liye ، jabky hakyky jamd fnkshn awwrlwdangh azaghr main dstyab nahin hay ، aap fnkshn kay andr dayfalt dlyl ki akdar aur mshrwta mntak ka astamal krkay isi tarah ki faalyt haasal krsktay hayn۔awwrlwdangh kay fnkshn kay liye azaghr ka nktaha nzar msthakm ksm ki zabanwn sy mkhtlf hay ، lekin yeh ab bhi fraham krdha dlail ki bnyad par lchkdar aur mthark tarza aml ki ajazat dyta haay۔

Question: "ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain js main khud twazan bainry tlash kay drkht ki nmaindghy ki jaye ، jesay aay wy ayl ka drkht ya srkh rngh ka drkht۔"
Answer: ykyna!yhaan ayk azaghr klas ka ayk msaal aml hay js main hadayt shuda wzan waly ghraf ki nmaindghy hawty hay aur djkstra kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay liye ayk tarykha fraham krna: paiythwnkpy kwdaympwrt haypkfwrm klykshnza draamd dayfalt dakt klas ghraf: dayf __ (khwd): sylf __ (khwd)= dayfalt dakt (fharst) sylf۔ waits = {} dayf ayda_wrtyks (sylf ، wrtyks): sylf.wrtyss۔ aydada (wrtyks) dayf ayda_j (sylf ، say_twryks ، tw_wrtyks ، wzan): sylf daat ay day ays [mnjanb_try ayks]self.weights [(from_vertex ، to_vertex)] = wzan Def dijkstra (khwd ، start_vertex): fasalwn = {v: flwt ('inf') v kay liay۔start_vertex)) jabky trjyhay_dk: mwjwdha_daystyns ، krnt_wrtyks = hayp kyw.appp (trjyhay_kyw) agar mwjwdha_dastns> fasalwn [mwjwdha_wrtyks]: khud prawsy main prawsy kay liye jary rkhyn۔+ wzan agar fasalha <fasalwn [prawsy]: fasalwn [prawsy] = fasalha hayp kyw۔ haypsh (trjyhay_kyw ، (fasalha ، prawsy)) wapsy fasalwn ki wapsy mkhtsar tryn_path (sylf ، astart_wrtyks ، aynda_wrtyks): fasalwn = sylf۔ dajkstra (astart_wrtyks) rastha =[] krnt_wrtyks = ayndawrtyks jabky krnt_wrtyks! = astart_twryks: path.srt (0 ، krnt_tyks) khud main prawsy kay liay۔ [mwjwdha_wrtyks]: agar fasalwn [krnt_wrtyks] == fasalwn [prawsy] + syl۔]: krnt_wrtyks = prawsy bryk path۔ INSERT (0 ، astart_wrtyks) wapsy ka rastha# astamal ki msaal: ghraf = ghraf () ghraf.adada_wrtyks ('aay') ghraf.ayda_tyks ('by') ghraf.aday_ttyks ('sy') ghraf.add_vertex ('d') ghraf.ayda_ttyks ('ay') ghraf.aday_j ('a' ، 'b' ، 5) ghraf.aday_j ('a' ، 'c' ، 3) ghraf.aday_j ('by'..add_edge ('d' ، 'e' ، 2) mkhtsar tryn_path = ghraf.shwrtyst_path ('a' ، 'e') prnt (mkhtsar tryn_path) # aaؤt pt: ['a' ، 'c' ، 'd' ، 'E'] is nfaza main ، ghraf klas hadayt shuda wzan waly ghraf ki nmaindghy krta haay۔as main amwdy ka ayk syt ، knarwn ki lght ، aur wzan ki lght haay۔add_vertex kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey amwdy ko shaml kya jata hay ، aur un kay mtalkha wzan waly knarwn ko add_edge kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey shaml kya jata haay۔ dajkstra ka tarykha ghraf main dyiay gaye astart wrtyks sy mkhtsar trien rastay tlash karnay kay liye dajkstra kay alghwrthm ko nafza krta haay۔yha un kay mwjwdha fasalwn ki bnyad par amwdy ki trjyhay ktaar brkrar rkhta haay۔yha kam sy kam fasalay kay sath tkrar kay tawr par amwdy ka antkhab krta hay ، agar koi chhwta rastha mil jata hay tou apnay prawsywn kay fasalwn ko ap dayt krta hay ، aur is wkt tak jary rhata hay jab tak keh tamam amwdy aml par karrwaiy nah haw۔ mkhtsar tryn_path ka tarykha ayk dyiay gaye aaghaza aur akhttam kay darmiyan mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay liye dajkstra kay tarykha kar ko astamal krta haay۔wrtyks۔yha akhttam kay upar sy astart wrtyks tak byk tryk krta hay ، js kay bad djkstra kay alghwrthm kay doran rykarda kyay gaye kam sy kam fasalwn kay sath knarwn kay bad۔ astamal ki msaal kay tawr par ، ayk ghraf aabjykt tyar kya jata hay ، amwdy tawr par 'ay kay zaryaay' ay 'shaml kya jata hay ، aur un kay sath knarwnmtalkha wzan shaml kya jata haay۔mkhtsar tryn_path kay tarykha kar ko 'A' kay sath astart wrtyks kay tawr par aur 'E' ko akhttamy had kay tawr par kaha jata haay۔

Question: "flask-dy ya pyynjykt jesay azaghr main kntrwl (IOC) kntynrza aur anhasaar anjykshn (DI) frym wrk kay alta kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔"
Answer: azaghr main hum aahanghy sy mrad mtadd kamwn ya aml ko byk wkt anjam denay ki salahayt haay۔yha kesi prwghram kay mkhtlf hasawn ko aazaadanha tawr par chlanay aur byk wkt pyshrft karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، js ki wjha sy karkrdghy aur rdaml main azuafha hawta haay۔ pythwn hum aahanghy kay hasawl kay liye mtadd mykanzam mhaya krta hay ، js main dhaghay aur aml shaml hayn۔ thrydaza: dhaghay kesi aml kay andr aml draamd kay halkay wzan waly akaiy hayn۔wha ayk hi mymwry ki jghha ka ashtrak karty hain ، js sy woh mshtrkha aadad wa shmar ko aasany sy bat chyt aur rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔azaghr ka thrydangh madaywl thrydaza kay sath kam karnay kay liye ayk aaly stahay antrfys mhaya krta haay۔ yahan ki ayk msaal jo hum aahanghy par amldraamd kay liye dhaghwn kay astamal ko zaahar Question: "azaghr main dayta syrylaizayshn aur daysyrylaizayshn kay asawlwn par tbadlha khyal karain ، aur JSON ، XML ، aur prwtwkwl bfr jesay mkhtlf farmyts ka mwazanha kryn۔"
Answer: ryasty nmwnha ayk tarza aml kay dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo kesi shay ko is kay tarza aml ko tbdyl karnay ki ajazat dyta hay jab is ki dakhly haalt bdl jati haay۔yha kesi shay ko zaahar karnay kay kabl bnata hay ghwya keh woh mkhtlf ryastwn ko alag alag tabkwn main ghhyrnay aur mwjwdha ryasty aabjykt main tarza aml ko tfwyzu krkay rn taim kay wkt apni klas ko tbdyl krta haay۔ jab kesi shay ka tarza aml is ki dakhly haalt ki bnyad par mkhtlf hawta hay tou ryast ka nmwnha mfyd hay ، aur aysa hawta haay۔braay mshrwta byanat ya swich kysza ka shaara liye baghair mthark tawr par apnay tarza aml ko tbdyl karnay ki zurwrt haay۔as sy shay aur is ki ryastwn kay mabyn dahylay jwraay ko frwgh mlta hay ، aur hr ryast apnay tarza aml ko zayada madaywlr aur brkrar rkhnay kay kabl bna sakti haay۔ yahan azaghr main ryasty pytrn ka ayk msaal aml haay: paiythwn kwpy kwdaklas aardastyt: dayf shp (khwd ، aardar): pas dayf kynsl (khwd ، aardar): pasklas nywrdar astyt (aardarstyt): dayf shp (khwd ، aardar): prnt ("shpngh aardar ...") aardar۔ astyt = shpdar astyt () dayf mnswkh (khwd ، aardar): prnt۔"bhyjay hoey aardar ko mnswkh nahin krskta۔"klas aardar: Def __init __ (khwd): self.state = newordstate () Def jhaaza (khwd): self.state.shp (khwd) Def mnswkh (khwd): self.state.cancel (khwd)# astamal ki msaal: aardar =aardar () aardar.shp () # aaؤt pt: shpngh aardar ... aardar.kansyl () # aaؤt pt: mnswkh karna aardar ... aardar.shp () # aaؤt pt: mnswkh shuda aardar nahin krsktay hayn۔ is msaal main ، hamary pas ayk klas haay۔ayk aardar ki mkhtlf ryastwn ki nmaindghy karnay wala drjha bndy۔aardastyt klas bys klas hay jo tamam aardar ryastwn kay antrfys ki wzuahat krty haay۔har knkryt astyt sbklas ، jesay nywrdar astyt ، shpdardar astyt ، aur kywndarwrdar astyt ، is ryast sy wabstha tarza aml ko nafza krta haay۔ aardar klas ayk aardar aabjykt ki nmaindghy krta hay jo is ki ryast ko mthark tawr par tbdyl krskta haay۔as main tarykay jhaaza () aur mnswkh () hain jo mwjwdha ryast kay shay kay sath slwk ko tfwyzu karty hayn۔ jab abtdaiy tawr par koi aardar tyar kya jata hay tou ، yeh nywrdar astyt sy shrwa hawta haay۔nywrdar astyt main jhaaza () ka tarykha ryast ko shpdar astyt main tbdyl krta hay ، aur mnswkh () tarykha ryast ko mnswkh karnay waly dawrdar astyt main bdl dyta haay۔har ryast slwk ko mnasb tarykay sy snbhalty hay aur zurwrt kay mtaabk aardar aabjykt ki haalt ko tbdyl krty haay۔ astamal ki msaal kay tawr par ، hum ayk aardar aabjykt bnatay hain aur jhaaza () ko kal karty hain aur () tarykwn ko kal karty hain ، jo mwjwdha ki mwjwdha haalt ki bnyad par tarza aml ko mthark karty hayn۔trtyb.aaؤt pt yeh zaahar krta hay keh ryast ki bnyad par tarza aml mthark tawr par kis tarah tbdyl hawta haay۔ ryast ka nmwnha ashyaa ko andrwny ryast ki mntkly ki bnyad par apnay tarza aml ko tbdyl karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، lchk ، twsya ، aur madaywlr kwda ko frwgh dyta haay۔yha kesi shay kay tarza aml ko shay sy hi alag krta hay ، js sy shay kay kwda main trmym kyay baghair ryastwn ko shaml karna ya is main trmym karna aasan hawjata haay۔

Question: hadayt shuda ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain aur trjn kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey mzubwtay sy mnslk ajzaaa tlash karnay kay tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!andraj ، hazaf karnay ، aur tlash kay tarykwn kay sath try (sabkha drkht) ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ka ayk msaal aml haay: paiythwn kwpy kwdaklas traiynwda: dayf __init __ (khwd): sylf۔ chaildayn = {} sylf۔(khwd): self.root = trienode () Def dakhl karain (khwd ، lfza): mwjwdha = self.root lfza main char kay liay: agar krnt main nhayn۔ bchwn main nhayn: mwjwdha۔ bchwn [char] = traiynwda () mwjwdha = mwjwdha = krnt.kryn [char] mwjwdha۔ is_end_of_word = schay dayf srch (khwd ، lfza): mwjwdha = sylf۔ lfza main char kay liay۔DEF starts_with (khwd ، sabkha): mwjwdha = self.root kay liye sabkha myn: agar krnt main nahin haay۔ agar mwjwdha main nahin haay۔ bchwn ko waps karain = mwjwdha۔، wrda ، andayks): agar asharyha == lyn (lfza): agar nahin nwda۔ is_end_of_word: ghalat nwda۔ is_end_of_word = ghalat rytrn lyn (nwda.krynyn) == 0 char = wrda [andayks] agar char nwda main nahin haay۔bchay: ghalat waps lwtyn = _delete (nwda.krza [char] ، wrda ، andayks + 1) agar hona chahaiay: dayl nwda۔ bchwn [char] rytrn lyn (nwda.kaildayn) == 0 ghalat _ daylyt (sylf daat lwt ، lfza ،، 0)# astamal ki msaal: try = try () try۔ anrt ("aypl") try.srt ("kylay") try.srt ("kar") traiy.srt ("kalyn") prnt (try۔ srch (srch (""aypl")) # aaؤt pt: trwpnt (try.srch ("kylay")) # aaؤt pt: trwpnt (try.srch ("kar")) # aaؤt pt: trwpnt (try۔ srch ("kalyn")) # aaؤt pt:sch prnt (trie.search ("CAT")) # aaؤt pt: ghalat prnt (trie.starts_with ("app")) # aaؤt pt: try prnt (trie.starts_with ("ban")) # aaؤt pt: try prnt (try prnt ("kar") # aaؤt pt: trwpnt (try.aystrts_ wِth (" karp ")) # aaؤt pt: trwpnt (try.aystrts_ wِth (" daagh ")) # aaؤt pt: falsytrry.daylyt (" kylay ") prnt (try۔ srch (" kylay ("kyla"") # aaؤt pt: is par aml draamd ko fals ، trynywda klas try main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krta haay۔as main bchwn kay nwdas ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye lght kay bchay shaml hain ، aur ayk bwlyn prchm IS_END_OF_WORD is bat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye keh agar koi lfza is nwda par khtm hawta haay۔ try klas try dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krty haay۔as main jra ka nwda hay aur andraj ، hazaf karnay ، tlash ، aur sabkha mlap kay tarykay fraham krta haay۔dakhl karnay ka tarykha lfza kay hr ayk krdar kay zaryaay tkrar krta hay ، js sy zurwrt kay mtaabk niay nwdas pyda hawtay hayn۔tlash ka tarykha try ko abwr krta hay ، janch pratal krta hay keh aya hr krdar mwjwd hay aur kesi drst lfza par khtm hawta haay۔shrwaat ka tarykha chyk krta hay agar try main dyiay gaye ayk sabkha mwjwd haay۔hazaf karnay ka tarykha ayk bar bar chlnay wala mddghar fnkshn astamal krta hay _ try sy ayk lfza hazaf karnay kay liye ، nwdas ko hatanay kay liye js ki zurwrt nahin haay۔ astamal ki msaal main ، ayk try aabjykt tyar kya gaya hay ، aur "aypl ،" "kylay ،" "kar jesay alfaza ، aur alfaza"awr" kalyn "dakhl kya gaya haay۔tlash kay tarykha kar ko yeh chyk karnay kay liye kaha jata hay keh aya try main mkhsawsa alfaza mwjwd hain ya nhayn۔starts_with tarykha yeh chyk karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh aya kuch sabkha mwjwd hain ya nahin

Question: "azaghr main fnkshnl prwghramngh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur aaly aardar kay afaal ، lymbdaa kay tasarat ، aur nkshha/km/fltr aapryshnza ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔"
Answer: azaghr main ، wrchwil tarykay bys klas main byan krdha tarykay hain lekin is ka mksad zayly tabkat kay zaryaha awwrrada hona haay۔"wrchwil" ki asatalaha is bat ki nshandhay krty hay keh rn taim kay wkt asal aabjykt ki ksm ki bnyad par is tarykha kar kay nfaza ka mthark tawr par taay kya jaskta haay۔wrchwil tarykay pwlymwrfzam kay hasawl kay liye ayk bnyady tsawr hain ، jo mkhtlf tabkwn kay ashyaa ko ayk dusray kay sath bdlay janay ka alaj karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ azaghr main ، tamam tarykwn ko btawr dayfalt wrchwil smjha jata haay۔kchh dusri zabanwn (jysay ، C ++) kay braks ، azaghr ko wrchwil kay tawr par kesi tarykha kar kay wazuha aalan ki zurwrt nahin haay۔as kay bjaiay ، bys klas main byan krdha tarykwn ko akhza krdha klaswn main zayr kya jaskta hay ، aur mnasb aml ko mthark tawr par hal kya jata hay js ki bnyad par asal shay ka astamal kya jarhaa haay۔ pwlymwrfzam kesi shay ki salahayt hay keh woh bohat sy shklwn ya aksam ko la skay۔as sy mkhtlf tabkwn ki ashyaa ko aam bys klas ki ashyaa kay tawr par slwk karnay ki ajazat mlty hay ، kwda ko dwbarha astamal ، lchk aur twsya kay kabl bnata haay۔ yeh smjhnay kay liye ayk msaal par ghwr karain keh kis tarah wrchwil tarykay azaghr main pwlymwrfzam main shrakt karty hayn: paiytwn kapy kwdaklas janwrwn: dayf aspyk (khwd): nwtymplymnt dayrr ("sbklas ko 'bwlnay kay tarykha kar par aml draamd karna chahaiay۔") klas daagh (janwr): dayf aspyk (khwd): waps "wwf!" klas bly (janwr): dayf aspyk (khwd): waps "myw!"klas ghaiay (janwr): dayf aspyk (khwd): janwrwn main janwrwn kay liye "mw!"# pwlywmwrfk useageamals = [ktay () ، bly () ، ghaiay ()] waps kryn: is msaal main prnt (janwrwn ki jghha ())، hamary pas ayk bys klas janwr hay js main wrchwil tarykha hay ()۔bys klas main bwlnay wala () tarykha ayk nwtymlyirdayrr ko athata hay kywnkha is ka mksad zayly tabkat main khtm hona haay۔ zayly tabkat kta ، bly ، aur ghaiay janwrwn ki klas sy wrasat main hain aur aspyk () kay tarykha kar par un ka apna aml draamd fraham karty hayn۔lwp kay l we ، hum janwrwn ki mkhtlf ashyaa ki ayk fharst bnatay hain ، bshmwl ktay ، bly aur ghaiay ki msaalyn۔as kay bad hum fharst par tkrar karty hain aur hr shay par bwlnay () kay tarykha kar ko kal karty hayn۔asy tarykha kar kay nam (bwlnay ()) ko astamal karnay kay bawjwd ، mnasb nfaza ko mthark tawr par asal aabjykt ki ksm ki bnyad par hal kya jata haay۔ kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: kapy kwdaywf! myw! mw! yahan ، pwlymwrfzam ka mzaaharha mkhtlf ashyaa ka alaj krkay kya jata hay (aam bys klas janwrwn ki msaal kay tawr par kta ، bly ، ghaiay)۔har shay par bwlnay waly () ka tarykha kar par zawr diya jata hay ، aur mtalkha awwrdada nfaza par aml draamd kya jata hay ، js kay ntyjay main mkhtlf aawazayn chhapty hayn۔ khlasaha main ، azaghr main wrchwil tarykwn sy akhza krdha klaswn main tarykwn ko zayr karnay ki ajazat hawty hay ، aur un kay nfaza ka tayn mthark tawr par is ki bnyad par kya jata haay۔asal aabjykt ki ksm۔as salahayt sy pwlymwrfzam kay hasawl main ، mkhtlf tabkwn ki ashyaa ko ayk dusray kay sath bdlay janay ka alaj karnay aur kwda kay dwbarha astamal aur lchk ko frwgh denay main mdd mlty haay۔

Question: "azaghr main wakaha ki swrsngh aur sy kyw aar ays (kmanda astfsar ki zamha dary ko alag krnay) kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain ، aur yeh btaiyn keh woh sstm askyl ayblty aur aadaytyblty ko kis tarah bhatr bnasktay hayn۔"
Answer: tyst sy chlnay wali trky (ty day day) ayk saft wyir dawylpmnt aprwch hay jo asal kwda ko nafza karnay sy pehlay khwdkar tyst lkhnay par zawr dyta haay۔yha "srkh ، sbza ، ryfyktr" kay ayk chkrmk aml ki pyrwy krta hay ، jahan pehlay tyst lkhay jatay hain ، kwda ko tyst pas karnay kay liye nafza kya jata hay ، aur phir is kwda ko apnay dayzaain aur brkrar rkhnay ko bhatr bnanay kay liye ryfyktr kya jata haay۔ tyst sy chlnay wali trky kay asawlwn main shaml hayn۔: pehlay tyst lkhyn: ty day day main ، dawylprza ayk nakam tyst lkh kar shrwa karty hain jo mtalwbha tarza aml ya faalyt ki wzuahat krta haay۔yha tyst fychr ki zurwryat ya wzuahatwn ki bnyad par lkhay gaye hain jo nafza kyay jarhaay hayn۔ kam sy kam kwda lkhyn: ayk bar jab tyst lkha jata hay tou ، dawylprza phir tyst pas bnanay kay liye zurwry kwda ki kam sy kam rkm lkhtay hayn۔as sy sadghy ko frwgh mlta hay aur zayada anjynirngh ko rwkta haay۔ rn tyst aur ryfyktr: kwda kay nfaza kay bad ، niay bshmwl niay tyst par aml draamd kya jata haay۔aghr koi tyst nakam hawjata hay tou ، dawylprza is wkt tak kwda ko bhatr bnatay hain jab tak keh tamam tyst pas nah hawjaiyn۔ayk bar jab tyst pas hawjatay hain tou ، kwda ko apnay dayzaain ko bhatr bnanay ، nkl ko door karnay aur brkrar rkhnay ko brahanay kay liye ryfyktr kya jata haay۔ saft wyir dawylpmnt prwjykts main tyst sy chlnay wali trky kay fwaid yeh hayn: bhatr kwda ka mayar: ty day day dawylprza ko is sy pehlay dayzaain aur faalyt kay baray main ghharaiy sy swchnay ki trghyb dyta haay۔lkhna kwda۔phalay tyst lkhnay sy ، tkazuwn ki wazuha wzuahat ki jati hay ، js kay ntyjay main zayada mzubwta aur kabl aatmad kwda hawta haay۔tyst ayk hafazaty jal kay tawr par kam karty hain ، rjat psndwn ko pkratay hain aur kyraay ko kwda bys main rynghnay sy rwktay hayn۔ bytr kwda brkrar rkhnay: ty day day kwda ki bar bar ryfyktrngh ko frwgh dyta haay۔ryfyktrngh dayzaain ko bhatr bnanay ، nkl ko door karnay ، aur mwjwdha faalyt ko twraay baghair brkrar rkhnay main mdd krta haay۔jama tyst swyt is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh ryfyktrngh kay doran ki janay wali kesi bhi tbdylywn sy nya ayb mtaarf nahin hawta haay۔ fair aaraa aur bgh ka ptha lghana: ty day day kwda ki tbdylywn par fwry aaraa fraham krta haay۔tyst ksart sy chlanay sy ، dawylprza fwry tawr par msail aur kyraay ki nshandhay karty hayn۔chwnkha tyst khwdkar hain ، lhazaa woh mslsl chlaya jaskta hay ، js sy msail ki jld ptha lghanay aur dsty janch aur daybghngh par khrch hony waly wkt ko kam karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ bohat zayada aatmad aur tbdyly ka khwf km: tystwn kay ayk jama swt kay sath ، dawylprza apnay kwda par aatmad haasal karty hayn۔wha ghair aalanyha ntaij mtaarf kranay kay khwf kay baghair tbdylyan aur ryfyktr kwda krsktay hayn۔tyst ayk hafazaty jal mhaya karty hain ، jo kesi bhi tarah kay rjat psndwn ko pkratay hayn۔tsaryhaat kay tawr par tyst lkhnay sy tkazuwn aur twkaat ko wazuha karnay main mdd mlty haay۔tyst zandha dstawyzaat kay tawr par kam karty hain ، jo nzaam kay tarza aml ki mshtrkha tfhaym fraham karty hayn۔ paiydar rftar aur pydawary salahayt: ty day day trky kay liye nzam wa zubta kay nktaha nzar ko frwgh dyta hay ، js sy dawylprza ko bohat door janay ya ghair zurwry khsawsayat ko nafza karnay sy rwkta haay۔tharyry tystwn par twjha mrkwza pehlay trkyaty aml ko zayada kntrwl rkhty hay aur kam ki paiydar rftar ki ajazat dyty haay۔ awwr ، tyst sy chlnay wali trky ayk kymty aml hay jo kwda kay mayar ، brkrar rkhnay aur abtdaiy bgh ka ptha lghanay ko frwgh dyta haay۔yha kwda bys par aatmad pyda krta hay ، bahamy taawn ki shawlt fraham krta hay ، aur saft wyir dawylpmnt mnsawbwn main mjmway pydawry ko bhatr bnata haay۔

Question: ayk lahakha srny ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain aur mwsar tzaiyn ki tlash aur pytrn mmasalt kay liye tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!yhaan ayk azaghr klas ka ayk msaal hay js main srklr bfr (rngh bfr) ki nmaindghy hawty hay js main ankyw ، day kywiw ، aur saiza ki karrwaiy hawty haay: paiythwn kwpy kwdaklas srklr bfr: dayf __init __ (khwd ، salahayt): sylf.ayspysty = salahayt sylf۔bfr = [kwiy nhayn] *salahayt khwd۔): agar self.is_full (): astsanaa ko brahaؤ ("bfr bhra hoa haay") sylf۔ bfr [sylf۔ ryir] = aaitm sylf۔dequeue (khwd): agar self.is_empty (): astsanaa brahaؤ ("bfr khaly haay") aaitm = sylf۔ bfr [sylf۔ frnt] sylf۔ bfr [sylf۔ frnt] = koi bhi nhayn۔1) ٪ sylf۔ kypysy۔30) bfr۔ ankyw (40) bfr۔ ankyw (50) prnt (bfr.daykyw ()) # aaؤt pt: 10 prnt (bfr.daykyw ()) # aaؤt pt: 20 bfr.nkyw (60) bfr.nkyw (70) prnt (70) prnt (bfr.daykyw ()) # aaؤt pt: 30 prnt (bfr.daykyw ()) # aaؤt pt: 40 prnt (bfr.daykyw ()) # aaؤt pt: 50 prnt (bfr.daykyw ()) # aaؤt pt: 60 prnt (bfr.daykyw ())# aaؤt pt: 70 main yeh aml draamd ، srklr bfr klas ayk srklr bfr ki nmaindghy krta haay۔as ki abtda salahayt kay pyramytr kay sath ki hogi hay ، jo bfr kay pas rkhnay waly anasar ki zayada sy zayada tadad ka tayn krty haay۔bfr ko abtdaiy salahayt kay sath ayk fharst kay tawr par nafza kya jata hay ، aur azuafy anasar ko tkwyt bkhsh aur is sy dwchar kya jaskta haay۔ IS_EMPTY aur IS_FOLL tarykwn ki janch pratal karain keh aya bfr baltrtyb khaly hay ya mkml haay۔ankyw ka tarykha bfr main kesi shay ko shaml krta hay ، janch pratal karty hoey keh yeh shaml karnay sy pehlay bhra hoa hay ya nhayn۔daykyw ka tarykha bfr sy aaitm ko hatata hay aur waps krta hay ، yeh janchtay hoey keh aya yeh hatanay sy pehlay khaly haay۔ astamal ki msaal kay tawr par ، ayk srklr bfr aabjykt 5 ki ghnjaish kay sath tyar kya jata haay۔tarykhaaaؤt pt is trtyb ko zaahar krta hay js main anasar ko daykwyda kya jata haay۔ nwt karain keh ayk srklr bfr main ، jab bfr apni salahayt tak phanch jata hay tou ، is kay ntyjay main srklr andaza main kdym trien anasar ko awwr lkhtay hayn۔

Question: "saft wyir tystngh kay asawlwn aur janch kay mkhtlf asawlwn par tbadlha khyal karain ، jesay ywnt tystngh ، anzumam ki janch ، aur sstm tystngh۔"
Answer: adaaptr pytrn ayk sakhty dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo mkhtlf klaswn kay mtzuad antrfys ko mil kar kam karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha ayk tabkay kay antrfys ko dusray antrfys main tbdyl krkay do mtzuad antrfys kay mabyn ayk pl kay tawr par kam krta hay js ki klaint ki twka haay۔ adaaptr pytrn kay aham ajzaaa yeh hayn: hadf: yeh is antrfys ki nmaindghy krta hay js kay sath mؤkl kam karnay ki twka krta haay۔klas js ko dahalnay ki zurwrt haay۔as main ayk mtzuad antrfys hay jsay klaint kay zaryaha braha rast astamal nahin kya jaskta۔ aydaaptr: yeh woh klas hay jo targht antrfys ko nafza krty hay aur adaapty ko lpytty haay۔yha klaint ki kalwn ko kalwn main adaapty kay antrfys main trjmha krta haay۔ adaaptr ka nmwnha aysay mnzarnamwn main mfyd hay jahan aap kay pas antrfys kay sath mwjwdha kwda ya tesri party ki laibryry mwjwd hain jo aap kay baky kwda bys sy mtaabkt nahin rkhtay hayn۔mwjwdha kwda main trmym karnay ya isy apnay antrfys kay mtaabk bnanay ki kwshsh karnay kay bjaiay ، aap ayk adaaptr tshkyl dy saktay hain jo do antrfys kay mabyn kalwn ka trjmha karnay kay liye ayk drmyany prt kay tawr par kam krta haay۔ yahan azaghr main adaaptr pytrn ko nafza karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiytwn kwpy kwda#targht antrfysklas mydaya plyir: dayf play (khwd ، fail ka nam): pas# adaapty klas klas lyghysy mysk plyir: dayf play_mwsk (khwd ، fail): prnt ("myrasay mywzak plyir khylna:" ، fail).ayk mydaya plyir antrfys rakhien jo khyl kay tarykha kar ki wzuahat krta haay۔hamaray pas ayk lyghysy klas lyghysy mysk plyir bhi hay js main ayk play_mwsk tarykha kay sath ayk mkhtlf antrfys hawta haay۔ mydaya plyirdaaptr klas ayk adaaptr kay tawr par kam krta hay ، js nay mydaya plyir antrfys ko nafza kya aur lyghysy mysk plyir ko lpyt lya۔yha play kay tarykha kar ko lyghysy mysk plyir kay play_mwsk tarykha kar ki kal main trjmha krta haay۔ klaint kwda mydaya plyirdaaptr ki ayk msaal tyar krta hay ، js main is kay knstrktr ko lyghysy mysk plyir aabjykt ko mntkl krta haay۔jb mydaya_ plyir aabjykt par play kay tarykha kar ko blaya jata hay tou ، yeh ghair mtaabkt pzayr antrfys ko apnatay hoey ، lyghysy mysk plyir kay play_mwsk tarykha ko dakhly tawr par kal krta haay۔ kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: yaml kwpy kwda lyghysy mywzak plyir khyl raha haay: ghana۔ aym py 3 is msaal kay tawr par ، adaaptr pytrn ajazat dyta hay ، adaaptr pytrn is ki ajazat dyta haay۔mydaya plyir antrfys un kay mtzuad antrfys kay bawjwd ، mwjwdha lyghysy mysk plyir klas kay sath baghair kesi rkawt kay kam kray gha۔klaint kwda prday kay pychhay hony wali bnyady mwafkt sy aaghaha kyay baghair mydaya_ plyir aabjykt ka astamal krskta haay۔ awwr ، adaaptr pytrn ghair mtaabkt pzayr antrfys ko ayk sath kam karnay ، kwda ki dwbarha astamal ، lchk ، aur saft wyir sstm main anzumam main aasany ko frwgh denay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Question: "tksym shuda nzaamwn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur azaghr main mstkl mzaajy ، dstyaby ، aur tksym rwadary (sy aay py thywrym) kay chylnjwn par tbadlha khyal kryn۔"
Answer: azaghr main ، mytaklass klas hain jo dusray tabkwn kay tarza aml ki wzuahat karty hain ، jnhyn aam tawr par un ki "klas fyktrywn" kaha jata haay۔wha aap ko is bat ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dytay hain keh klaswn ko kis tarah tkhlyk kya jana chahaiay ، un kay sath kon sy safat aur tarykay hona chahaiay ، aur inhain kis tarah brtaؤ karna chahaiay۔ mytaklas bakaadha klaswn sy zayada aaly staha par kam karty hayn۔aghrchha klasza wakaat kay tarza aml aur sakht ki wzuahat karty hain ، mytaklass khud klaswn kay tarza aml aur sakht ki wzuahat karty hayn۔dwsray lfzawn main ، mytaklass klas bnanay kay kwaad ki wzuahat karty hayn۔ mytaklas mkhtlf tarykwn sy klaswn ki tkhlyk aur tarza aml ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔mytaklass kay liye astamal kay kuch aam maamlat main shaml hayn: kwdangh kay mayarat ko nafza krna: mytaklass ko kesi prwjykt main mstkl kwdangh astail aur mayarat ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔aghr kwda un mayarat ki khlaf wrzay krta hay tou woh mkhsawsa rhanma khtawta par aml pyra hony kay liye klas ki taryf ki janch pratal krsktay hain aur ghltayan ya antbahaat atha saktay hayn۔as sy aap khud bkhwd klaswn main azuafy faalyt ko anjykshn lghasktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap klaswn main khud bkhwd kuch afadyt kay tarykwn ko shaml karnay ya kuch mkhsawsa haaltwn par mbny azuafy safat ko anjykshn lghanay kay liye mytaklas ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ klas rjstrywn ko nafza krna: mytaklas ko klas rjstry ya zayly tabkat ki rjstry bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yha mddghar saabt hawskta hay jab aap un tamam klaswn ka sragh lghana chahti hain jo kesi khasa bys klas sy warsa hawn۔mytaklas tamam zayly tabkat ki rjstry ko brkrar rakh sakta hay ، jo klaswn ki plgh un sstm ، twsya ، ya mthark dryaft kay liye karaamd saabt hawskta haay۔dayta bys tyblza۔mytaklas klas ki taryf ka maainha krta hay aur zurwry dayta bys kay swalat ، talkat ، aur dyghr nkshha sazay ki tshkylat tyar krta haay۔ ayk aasan msaal hay jo ayk kwdangh kay mayar ko nafza karnay kay liye mytaklas kay astamal ko zaahar krty haay: paiytwn kwpy kwdaklas maiy myta (ksm): dayf __ ny __ (sy ayl ays ، nam ، nam ، nam ، nam ، nam ، nam ،adaay ، aay ty aar ays): # chyk karain keh aya klas ki taryf kwdangh kay mayar par kaim hay agar "twsayk kryn" agar aay ty ty aar main nahin hay tw: taip ayrr (ayf "klas {nam} ko 'twsayk' ka tarykha ghaib krrhaa haay۔sy ayl ays ، nam ، adaay ، aay ty aar ays) klas maiklas (mytaklas = maiy myta): day ay ayf ki twsayk (khwd): prnt ("twsayk karna ...")# 'twsayk' kay tarykha kar kay baghair kesi klas ki wzuahat karnay ki kwshsh kar raha haay۔as msaal kay tawr par ، maiymyta mytaklas ki wzuahat ki hogi hay ، jo blt un taip mytaklas sy wrasat main mlty haay۔yha __ new__ tarykha kar ko zayr krta hay ، jo niy klasyn bnanay kay liye zamha dar haay۔ __ new__ tarykha chyk krta hay keh agar klas ki wzuahat ki jarhay hay tou is main twsayk ka tarykha haay۔aghr aysa nahin hawta hay tou ، ayk taip ayrr athaya jata hay ، js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh klas mtalwbha tarykha sy mharwm haay۔ maiklas klas twsayk karnay kay tarykha kar ki wzuahat krty hay aur maiymyta ko apnay mytaklas kay tawr par astamal krty haay۔chwnkha yeh mytaklas kay zaryaha nafza kwdangh kay mayar par aml pyra hay ، lhazaa is ki wzuahat kesi msilay kay baghair ki jati haay۔ dusri taraf ، twsayk kay tarykha kar kay baghair maiy wylyda klas klas ki wzuahat karnay ki kwshsh kay ntyjay main klas tkhlyk kay doran ayk taip ayrr athaya jata hay kywnkha yeh kwdangh kay mayar ki khlaf wrzay krta haay۔mytaklas kay zaryaha nafza kya ghya۔ yeh msaal yeh zaahar krty hay keh tkhlyk kay wkt tabkaty taryf ki twsayk krkay ayk mytaklas ko kis tarah ayk mkhsawsa kwdangh mayar ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ mytaklas ko azaghr main tabkaty tkhlyk par tkhsaysa aur kntrwl kay liye ayk taaktwr tarykha kar fraham krta hay ، js sy aap ko drzay ki ajazat mlty haay۔mkhsawsa tkazuwn ya rkawtwn ko pora karnay kay liye tabkaty slwk۔taham ، yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh mytaklas ko ansaaf kay sath astamal kya jana chahaiay ،

Question: "askyp lst ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain aur awsta kys kay mwsar wkt ki pychydghy kay sath dakhl ، hazaf karnay aur tlash kay tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: ykyna!yhaan ayk msaal kay tawr par ayk azaghr klas ka nfaza hay jo hadayt shuda aysaiklk ghraf (day aay jy) ki nmaindghy krta hay aur kahan kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey twpwlwjykl chhantnay kay liye ayk tarykha fraham krta haay: paiythwn kwpy kwdafrm klykshn draamd dayfalt dakt ، daywklas day aay jy: dayf __init __ (khwd): sylf ghraf = dayfalt dakt (fharst)dayf ayda_j (sylf ، yw ، wy): sylf ghraf [yw]: khud main V kay liay۔== 0: ktaar۔ apynda (yw) # mrhalha 3: tapwlwjykl chhantnay ka ntyjha anjam dyn = []. ghraf [u]: in_deggres [v] -= 1 agar in_degres [v] == 0: ktaar.aypynda (v) # mrhalha 4: agar lyn (ntyjha)! = lyn (sylf ghraf): chkrwn ki janch pratal kryn:astsanaa ("ghraf main ayk saiykl hawta haay") wapsy ka ntyjha# astamal ki msaal: day aay jy = day aay jy () day aay jy۔ ayda_j (1 ، 2) day aay jy۔ ayda_j (1 ، 3) day aay jy.aday_j (2 ، 4) day aay jy۔ ayda_j (3 ، 3 ،4) day aay jy.aday_j (4 ، 5) kwshsh kryn: chhantay hawiay_adar = day aay jy۔ twpwlwjykl_swrt () prnt ("twpwlwjykl aardar:" ، trtyb shdha_ aardar) swaiay is kay astsana kay ay: prnt ("ghltay:" ، ays ty aar (ay)) is aml main ،day aay jy klas hadayt shuda aysaiklk ghraf ki nmaindghy krty haay۔ADD_EDGE ka tarykha amwdy kay darmiyan knarwn ko shaml karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ twpwlwjykl_swrt ka tarykha KAHN kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey twpwlwjykl chhant raha haay۔yha tamam amwdy hasaay ki daghry ka hasab lghata hay ، daghry 0 rkhnay waly amwdy kay sath ayk ktaar ka aaghaza krta hay ، aur jab tak tamam amwdy aml par karrwaiy nah hony tak mlhakha amwdy ki un daghry ko kam krta haay۔aghr ntyjay main aardar main tamam amwdy hasaay shaml hain tou ، isy tapwlwjykl aardar kay tawr par waps krdya jata haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، ayk raayt ko ayk saiykl ki mwjwdghy ki nshandhay karnay main azuafha kya jata haay۔ astamal ki msaal kay tawr par ، ayk day aay jy aabjykt tyar kya jata hay ، aur ADD_EDGE kay tarykha kar ko astamal karty hoey amwdy kay darmiyan knarwn ko shaml kya jata haay۔ghraf kay tapwlwjykl aardar haasal karnay kay liye twpwlwjykl_swrt ka tarykha kaha jata haay۔aghr ghraf main ayk saiykl hawta hay tou ، ayk astsanaa athaya jata haay۔ nwt karain keh is aml sy yeh frzu kya gaya hay keh un pt ghraf ayk hadayt shuda aysaiklk ghraf (day aay jy) haay۔aghr ghraf main saiykl shaml hain tou ، twpwlwjykl_swrt ka tarykha kar ayk astsanaa ko braha dy gha۔ kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: sy ays ays kwpy kwdaytwpwlwjykl aardar: [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5] is msaal sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh hadayt ki tshkyl kay liye day aay jy klas ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay۔Acyclic ghraf aur is trtyb ko haasal karnay kay liye twpwlwjykl chhant raha hay js main amwdy aml par karrwaiy ki jany chahaiay۔

Question: saft wyir ryfyktrngh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur azaghr main kwda ki bw aur ryfyktrngh tknyk ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: phalw par mbny prwghramngh (aay aw py) ayk prwghramngh nmwnha hay js ka mksad saft wyir sstm main kras katnay kay khdshat ko madaywlraiza karna haay۔kras ktngh kay khdshat ayk aysay prwghram kay phalw hain jo mtadd hasawn ya madaywlza ko mtasar karty hain ، jesay laghngh ، ghltay sy nmtnay ، kychngh aur sykywrty۔aay aw py un khdshat ko bnyady karwbary mntak sy alag karnay ، madaywlryty ، brkrar rkhnay ، aur kwda ki dwbarha astamal sy alag karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔ aay aw py main ، kras katnay waly khdshat ko alag alag akaiywn main shaml kya jata hay jsay phalwؤn kehty hayn۔phalwؤn ko dwbarha kabl astamal mntak ki wzuahat ki hogi hay jo asal kwda main trmym kyay baghair kesi prwghram kay mtadd hasawn par laghw hawskty haay۔aay aw py nay pwaint kts aur mshwray kay tsawr ko mtaarf kratay hoey isy haasal kya: pwaint kt: ayk pwaint kt ayk aysy tsaryha hay jo kesi prwghram kay nfaza kay kuch nkat ki wzuahat krty hay jahan phalw ko laghw kya jana chahaiay۔yha nkat tarykha kar ki drkhwastwn ، aabjykt ki tkhlykat ، astsanaa hayndalngh ، ya kesi bhi dusray wakaay par mbny hawsktay hain jo prwghram par aml draamd kay doran hawta haay۔ aydawais: mshwrha is kwda ki nmaindghy krta hay jo pwaint kt kay zaryaha mtayn krdha mtayn krdha nkat par aml main laya jata haay۔yha kras katnay waly tarza aml ko smytta hay aur pwaint kt sy pehlay ، ya is kay aas pas sy pehlay is par aml draamd kya jaskta haay۔ aay aw py aam tawr par laghngh ، kychngh ، karkrdghy ki nghrany ، tranzaykshn mynjmnt ، aur sykywrty jesay khdshat ko door karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔mtadd laibryrywn aur frym wrk jo aay aw py ki hamayt karty hain ، phalwؤn ، pwaint kts aur mshwrwn ki wzuahat kay liye mykanzam mhaya karty hayn۔azaghr main aay aw py kay liye kuch mshhawr laibryrywn main shaml hayn: ayspyktlyb: azaghr kay liye ayk phalw par mbny prwghramngh laibryry jo aap ko sjawt ka astamal karty hoey phalwؤn ، pwaint kts ، aur mshwray ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔yha daykwrytrza ka astamal karty hoey phalwؤn ki wzuahat karnay aur tarykwn par un ka atalak karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔yha aap ko daykwrytrza ka astamal karty hoey phalwؤn ki wzuahat karnay aur un ko afaal ya tarykwn par laghw karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ yeh laibryry aam tawr par phalwؤn ki wzuahat karnay aur sjawt kay astamal sy afaal ya tarykwn ko nshanha bnanay kay liye un ka atalak karnay kay tarykay fraham karty hayn۔phalw mkhsawsa nkat par hadf kwda kay nfaza ko rwk saktay hain aur mtayn krdha mshwray par amldraamd krsktay hayn۔yha mshwrha azuafy karwaiyan anjam dy sakta hay ، targht kwda kay tarza aml main trmym krskta hay ، ya azuafy faalyt fraham krskta haay۔ yahan ayk aasan msaal hay js main APTHON main AOP ka mzaaharha karnay kay liye ASPECTLIB laibryry ka astamal kya jaskta haay: Pythoncopy Codefrom Ashaptlib draamd AspectClass laghngh asaspyt (phalw).my_function ")# AOP logingmy_function () kay sath fnkshn ko kal karna ، is msaal main ، hum askypt lِb laibryry ka astamal karty hoey ayk laghngh aspykt phalw ki wzuahat karty hayn۔as phalw kay ard ghrd kay mshwray ki wzuahat ki hogi hay ، jo hadf kay fnkshn par aml draamd sy pehlay aur is kay bad lagh pygham prnt krta haay۔jb my_function ko blaya jata hay tou ، phalw amldraamd ko rwkta hay ، mtayn mshwray (prntngh lagh pyghamat) par aml draamd krta hay ، aur phir asal fnkshn kay aml kay sath aaghay brahta haay۔ kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: scsscopy kwdayntrngh my_functionIncide my_function ko kis tarah dkhaya jaskta haayksy fnkshn ki bnyady faalyt sy lagh un khdshat ko alag karnay kay liye azaghr main laghw hawta haay۔phalw fnkshn kay aml ko rwkta hay aur asal kwda main trmym kyay baghair laghngh slwk ko shaml krta haay۔

Question: dawmyn sy mtalk mkhsawsa zabanwn (DSLs) kay asawlwn par tbadlha khyal karain aur yeh btaiyn keh un ko PYDSL ya ANTLR jesi laibryrywn ka astamal karty hoey azaghr main kesay nafza kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: mymwraizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo mhanghay fnkshn kalwn kay ntaij ko kych krkay aur jab wahi aadanwn kay dwbarha hony par un ko dwbarha astamal krkay afaal ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔yha khasa tawr par tkrar karnay waly afaal kay l useful mfyd hay jahan ayk hi aadanwn ko mtadd bar astamal kya jata hay ، js ki wjha sy bay kar kmpywtyshn hawty hayn۔wkt talb ghnty karnay sy pehlay ، fnkshn pehlay janch pratal krta hay keh agar dyiay gaye aadanwn ka ntyjha pehlay hi kyshay main mwjwd haay۔aghr yeh hay tou ، kyshda ntyjha is ki dwbarha ghnty kay bjaiay waps krdya gaya haay۔aghr ntyjha kyshay main nahin paya jata hay tou ، fnkshn hasab ko anjam dyta hay ، mstkbl kay astamal kay liye kyshay main ntyjha ko astwr krta hay ، aur is ka ntyjha lwtata haay۔ yahan ayk aysy msaal hay js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh kis tarah mymwry ko astamal kya jaskta hay keh kis tarah fbwnyky nmbrwn ki kmpywtngh kay liye ayk tkrar fnkshn ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔: paiythwn kwpy kwdaydaf fbwnyky (ayn ، kyshay = {}): agar n <= 1: waps n agar n agar kyshay myn: waps kyshay [n] ntyjha = fbwnyky (n - 1) + fbwnyky (n - 2) kyshay [n]= ntyjha ki wapsy ka ntyjha # astamal ki msaal prnt (fbwnaky (5)) # aaؤt pt: 5 prnt (fbwnyky (10)) # aaؤt pt: 55 prnt (fbwnaky (15)) # aaؤt pt: 610 un msaal kay tawr par ، fbwnaky fnkshn fbwnyky nmbr ki ghnty kay liye byan kya gaya haay۔dyiay gaye andayks kay liye n.as fnkshn main kyshay kay liye mymwaizayshn ka astamal kya jata hay is sy kbl kyshay ki lght main ntaij kay hasab sy ntaij ka astamal kya jata haay۔ jab fnkshn ko N ki kymt kay sath blaya jata hay tou ، yeh pehlay chyk krta hay keh agar is kdr ka ntyjha pehlay hi kyshay main mwjwd haay۔aghr yeh hay tou ، kyshda ntyjha waps aajata haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، fnkshn apnay aap ko chhwtay chhwtay asharyha jat kay liye bar bar kal krkay ntyjha ki ghnty krta hay ، ntyjha kyshay main hawta hay ، aur isy waps krta haay۔ ntaij kychngh kay zaryaha ، fnkshn ayn ki ayk hi akdar kay liye bay kar kmpywtyshn sy ghryza krta haay۔as kay ntyjay main ، fnkshn kay amldraamd kay wkt ko nmayan tawr par kam kya jata hay ، khasa tawr par N. nwt ki bray akdar kay liye keh kyshay ko fnkshn ki pehlay sy taay shuda dlyl main khaly lght kay tawr par shrwa kya jata haay۔as bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh ayk hi kyshay ki lght ko fnkshn kay liye mtadd kalwn main astamal kya jata hay ، js sy mymwaizayshn asar ko mhafwza rkhtay hawiay۔ mymwizaaizayshn tkrar karnay waly afaal ki karkrdghy ko bohat bhatr bna sakti hay jo awwrlypngh sab prwblymza ki nmaish krty hay ، jesay fbwnyky tslsl۔bay kar kmpywtwn sy ghryza karnay sy ، yeh wkt ki pychydghy ko mnfrd un pt ki tadad par mnhasar hay ، is wkt ki pychydghy ko kam krta haay۔ taham ، jab fnkshn main bar bar fnkshn kalza ki ayk kabl zakr tadad hawty hay tou yaddasht sab sy zayada mwsar hawty haay۔aysay maamlat main jahan aadanwn ko mnfrd hawta hay ya ksart sy tbdyl hawta hay ، kyshay ko brkrar rkhnay ka awwr hayda yaddasht kay fwaid sy kahain zayada hawskta haay۔

fharst main failwn ki fharst main di hogi fail ki tlash krta haay۔aghr mil gaya tou ، yeh fail aabjykt ko lwtata haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، yeh koi nahin lwtta haay۔get_directory ka tarykha isi tarah kam krta hay lekin daairyktrywn ki tlash krta haay۔ srch_fail ka tarykha daairyktry aur is ki sab daairktryza main dyiay gaye nam wali fail ki tkrar sy tlash krta haay۔yha chyk karnay kay liye GET_FILE tarykha ko kal krta hay keh aya fail mwjwdha daairktry main mwjwd hay ya nhayn۔aghr nahin mila tou ، yeh hr ayk sab daairktry par srch_fail kay tarykha kar ko bar bar kal krta hay aur fail ko waps hain keh get_directory aur get_file tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey un kay namwn sy daairyktrywn aur failwn ko bazayaft karnay ka tarykha۔aakhr main ، hum dkhatay hain keh srch_fail kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey poray fail sstm kay dahanchay main fail ko kis tarah tlash karna haay۔ kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: ays sy ays kwpy kwdada daairktry (dstawyzaat) fail (nwts daat ty ayks) fail (amyj.j py jy) is msaal sy zaahar hawta haayazaghr main fail sstm klas ki bnyady faalyt ، aap ko daairyktryza aur failyn bnanay ، dahanchay par tshryf la janay aur un kay namwn ki bnyad par failwn ki Answer: kmanda pytrn ayk tarza aml kay dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo aapryshn ko anjam denay waly shay sy kesi aapryshn kay mtlashy ko daykwl krta haay۔yha kesi drkhwast ko kesi shay kay tawr par shaml krta hay ، js sy aap ko mkhtlf drkhwastwn ، ktaar ya lagh un drkhwastwn kay sath mؤklwn ko pyramytraiza karnay ki ajazat mlty hay ، aur nakabl tskhyr karrwaiywn ki hamayt ki jaskty haay۔ kmanda pytrn dyta haay۔as sy aap ko aykshn (wsawl knndha) anjam denay waly aabjykt (wsawl knndha) sy drkhwast (anwkr) bnanay wali chyza ko dawpl karnay kay kabl bnata hay ، js sy sstm ko lchk aur twsya ki frahamy Question: dayta kmpryshn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur azaghr main kmpryshn alghwrthm jesay haf myn kwdangh ya lympl zayw wylch (LZW) ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: hum aahanghy waly mahawl main aadad wa shmar ki drstghy aur mstkl mzaajy ko ykyny bnanay kay liye mlty thrydada azaghr prwghramwn main hum aahanghy par kabw panay kay tarykha kar ka astamal mshtrkha wsail tak rsaiy kay antzaam aur hum aahangh kay liye kya jata haay۔aam tawr par astamal hony waly hum aahanghy par kabw panay kay tyn mykanzam talay ، symfwrs aur haalt mtghyr hayn۔aghrchha un sab ka mksad nsl kay haalat ko rwkna aur mshtrkha wsail tak rsaiy ko mrbwta karna hay ، lekin woh apnay tarza aml aur astamal kay mnzarnamwn main mkhtlf hayn۔aaiyay un main sy hr ayk par tbadlha khyal kryn: talay: talay hum aahanghy par kabw panay kay tarykha kar ki aasan trien shkl hayn۔wha bahamy akhraj fraham karty hain ، js sy sirf ayk dhaghay main ayk wkt main tala haasal hawta haay۔jb koi thryda lak haasal krta hay tou ، yeh mhafwza wsail tak khsawsay rsaiy haasal krta hay ، jab tak keh tala jary hony tak dusray dhaghwn ko is tak rsaiy sy rwkta haay۔azaghr main ، thrydangh madaywl sy lak klas ka astamal karty hoey talay aam tawr par nafza kyay jatay hayn۔talay aam tawr par kwda ya dayta dahanchay kay aham hasawn ki hafazat kay liye astamal hawtay hain jn tak ayk sath mtadd thrydaza kay zaryaha rsaiy haasal nahin ki jany chahaiay۔ symfwrza: symfwrs talay sy zayada wrstail hain kywnkha woh mtadd dhaghwn ko mshtrkha wsail tak byk wkt tak rsaiy ki ajazat dy saktay hayn۔ayk symfwr kaؤntr ko brkrar rkhta hay ، aur thrydaza symfwr ko haasal ya jary krsktay hayn۔aghr kaؤntr msabt hay tou ، ayk dhaghha symfwr haasal krskta hay ، aur kaؤntr kam hawjata haay۔aghr kaؤntr safr hay tou ، symfwr drkhwast denay waly dhaghay ko rwkta hay jab tak keh koi aur dhaghha symfwr jary nah kray۔symfwrs ko byk wkt wsail tak rsaiy haasal karnay waly thrydaza ki tadad ko mhadwd karnay ya dhaghwn kay mabyn srghrmywn ko mrbwta karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔azaghr main ، symfwrs ko thrydangh madaywl sy symfwr klas ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jata haay۔ kndayshn mtghyrat: mtadd dhaghwn kay mabyn mwasalat aur hum aahanghy ko mrbwta karnay kay liye haalt mtghyrat ka astamal kya jata haay۔wha dhaghwn ko aaghay brahnay sy pehlay kesi khasa haalt ko mtamin hony tak antzaar karnay dytay hayn۔ayk haalt mtghyr ayk talay kay sath wabstha hay aur wyt () ، mtala () ، aur mtala karnay walay_al () jesay tarykay mhaya krta haay۔dhaghay kesi haalt kay mtghyr par antzaar krsktay hain ، aur jab koi dusra dhaghha sghnl krta hay ya haalt kay mtghyr ko mtala krta hay tou ، antzaar ka dhaghha jaghta hay aur is sy wabstha talay ko dwbarha haasal krta haay۔haalt kay mtghyrat aksar prwdaywsr saarfyn kay nmwnwn ya mnzarnamwn ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kyay jatay hain jahan dhaghwn ko kesi mkhsawsa ryast ki tbdyly ka antzaar karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔azaghr main ، haalt kay mtghyrat ko thrydangh madaywl sy haalt klas ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jata haay۔ akhtlafat ka khlasaha karnay kay liay: talay kesi wsail tak khsawsay rsaiy fraham karty hain ، js sy ayk wkt main sirf ayk dhaghay ki ajazat hawty haay۔wha kwda ya dayta dahanchay kay tnkydy hasawn ki hafazat kay liye mwzawn hayn۔ symfwrza ayk mkhsawsa tadad main dhaghwn ko byk wkt wsail tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔an ka astamal byk wkt wsail tak rsaiy haasal karnay waly thrydaza ki zayada sy zayada tadad ko kntrwl karnay ya thrydaza kay mabyn srghrmywn ko mrbwta karnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔wha aam tawr par thryda hum aahanghy aur mwasalat kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh azaghr ka aalmy trjman lak (jy aai ayl) sirf ayk hi dhaghay ko ayk wkt main azaghr baiyk kwda par amldraamd karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، jo mlty thrydada azaghr prwghramwn ki karkrdghy ko mtasar krskta haay۔an haalat main jahan karkrdghy ayk tshwysh hay ، mtbadl tarykwn jesay mlty prwsysngh ya asynkrwns prwghramngh jesay hum aahanghy ko haasal karnay kay liye ghwr kya jaskta haay۔

Question: "tksym shuda nzaamwn main ghltay rwadary aur ghltay sy nmtnay kay asawlwn par tbadlha khyal karain ، aur azaghr main faltw pn ، nkl ، aur ghltay ki bazayaby jesi tknyk ki wzuahat kryn۔"
Answer: kntrwl ka alta (IOC) aur anhasaar anjykshn (DI) aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh kay tsawrat hain jo dahylay jwraay ko frwgh dytay hain aur kalr sy aabjykt tkhlyk aur anhasaar kay antzaam par kabw panay kay zaryaha kwda brkrar rkhnay aur janch ko bhatr bnatay hayn۔): rwayty prwghramngh main ، ayk shay apni anhasaar ko braha rast tkhlyk aur antzaam krty hay ، jo skht jwraay ka baasa bn sakti hay aur kwda ko brkrar rkhnay aur janchnay main mshkl bna sakti haay۔aaiy aw sy main ، kntrwl alta hay ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh ashyaa ko bnanay aur un ka antzaam karnay ki zamha dary kesi byrwny jzaw main tfwyzu ki jati hay ، jsay aksar aai aw sy kntynr ya frym wrk kaha jata haay۔aaiy aw sy kntynr ashyaa kay laif saiykl ka antzaam krta hay ، anhasaar ko hal krta hay ، aur inhain drkhwast denay wali ashyaa main anjkshn krta haay۔khdshat ki yeh alyhadghy ashyaa ko un ki bnyady faalyt par twjha denay ki ajazat dyty hay ، jabky anhasaar ki krardad ko byrwny tawr par snbhala jata haay۔ anhasaar anjykshn (day aaiy): anhasaar anjykshn ayk mkhsawsa tknyk hay jo kesi byrwny makhza sy kesi shay par anhasaar fraham karnay kay liye aai aw sy main astamal hawta haay۔as shay kay andr anhasaar pyda karnay kay bjaiay ، woh bahar sy "anjkshn lghaiay" hayn۔day aai ki tyn aam aksam hayn: knstrktr anjykshn: anhasaar ayk knstrktr kay zaryaha fraham kya jata haay۔anhasaar ko wazuha tawr par knstrktr pyramytrza kay tawr par krar diya jata hay ، aur aai aw sy kntynr aabjykt ki tkhlyk karty wkt sahayha msaalwn ko hal karnay aur fraham karnay kay liye zamha dar haay۔ syttr anjykshn: anhasaar syttr tarykwn kay zaryaay fraham kya jata haay۔aabjykt apnay anhasaar kay liye syttr tarykwn ko bay nkab krta hay ، aur IOC kntynr un sytr tarykwn ko kal krkay anhasaar ko anjykshn dyta haay۔ antrfys anjkshn: aabjykt ayk antrfys ko nafza krta hay jo anhasaar ko anjykshn lghanay kay liye ayk tarykha ki wzuahat krta haay۔aaiy aw sy kntynr is antrfys ko aabjykt par anhasaar fraham karnay kay liye astamal krta haay۔ day aai ka astamal karty hoey ، ashyaa zayada madaywlr hawjaty hain ، kywnkha woh thws nfaza kay bjaiay tjryd/antrfys par anhasaar karty hayn۔as sy dahylay jwraay ko frwgh mlta hay aur aasany sy dykh bhal ki ajazat mlty hay ، kywnkha anhasaar main tbdylyan khud hi is chyza main trmym kyay baghair ki jaskty hayn۔mzayd braan ، day aai anhasaar ko mzaak araanay ya tyst sy mtalk nfaza kay sath tbdyl karnay ، ywnt ki janch main aasany pyda karnay aur janch ki ahalyt ko bhatr bnanay ki ajazat dy kar aasan janch kay kabl bnata haay۔wha janch kay doran aasany sy tnhaaiy aur
